message: I am starting a kickstarter fundraiser for a new show. All proceeds will go to the show. It will be a 1 episode special with Sarah Lane hosting and three spectacular guests. 1. Fake Lee Sherman 2. The ballerina Sara Lane 3. Justin from the Verizon line.
Can you start something on behalf of others? Don't think so. Also kickstarter already rejected leo when he tried to raise cash for the brick house

"on behalf of others"? I am doing a show and need to pay TWiT for hosts and production, just like one may need to pay an production company.

Anyway it was a joke, there is no kickstarter program, feel free to check.
@richardya You are doing a show on twit? Interesting. As for kickstarter, i have no problem with you doing it if you could.

Kickstarter us for new businesses, which is most likely why the new TWiT studio idea was squashed, as Leo was only expanding an existing business/idea, he hadn't proposed anything new.  More likely the company that makes the bricks, starting out, they could have used the Kickstarter service - (then , again, they may have had used them?)
